text: Calliotropis delli is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eucyclidae. ==Description== The shell reaches a length of 4.8 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off the Kermadec Islands and New Caledonia. ==References== * Vilvens C. (2007) New records and new species of Calliotropis from Indo-Pacific. Novapex 8 (Hors Série 5): 1–72. ==External links== * delli Category:Gastropods described in 1979
title: Calliotropis delli
